ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sliceable sugar cookies, sliced
1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
4 cups assorted cut-up fruit (kiwi, strawberries, blueberries, drained canned mandarin oranges)
¼ cup apricot preserves, pressed through sieve to remove lumps

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for 30 minutes for smooth spreading
Press preserves through sieve to remove lumps for a smooth glaze
Arrange fruit just before serving to prevent browning and moisture loss
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through creating a colorful no-bake dessert pizza with a creamy Philadelphia base and fresh fruit topping.
